title: Prestige in the first half of 2020

replies.body: Is there any other way to earn prestige points?? Specifically talking about free to play ways?

No. You can only get them through buying the pass, grinding and buying the points, or buying 4 different event passes and doing the missions for the 25 prestige points.

You'll basically never be able to get free prestige points unless it's an extremely special event like we had last year with the 10th Anniversary.
